_description: Quick-read memory state. Fetched at conversation start via web_fetch or MCP.

last_session.summary: Emergency recovery: L2 rebuild had set wrong delivery mode and wrong payload field on all research jobs. Fixed both, feed growing again.

active_crons: nightly-synthesis (5am daily) — cross-domain insights via claude -p
known_fragile: MCP connector drops silently — server stays up, fix: remove/re-add in Settings
Scheduler maps job names by string match — don't rename or delete without checking lines 221-240
Gateway needs restart after config changes — also purge sessions
Local models break above 6 tools — byProvider restriction is load-bearing
MCP SSE keepalive patched (ping=15s) — monitor if drops still occur
known_fragile_points: OpenClaw payload.message vs payload.prompt — only message works
delivery.mode must be none for research jobs
